hook.text: Juice cleanses promise to flush toxins from your body. Your liver and kidneys already do that for free.

buildup.text: Detox diets typically involve fasting, juicing, or eliminating entire food groups for days or weeks.

discovery.text: No study has identified a toxin removed by a detox diet that the body couldn't handle on its own.

twist.text: Most weight lost during a cleanse is water and muscle. It returns within days of normal eating.

punchline.text: Your organs detox for free. Save the $200.
